thread.title: Liverpool’s Jordan Henderson ruled out of Leicester clash with injury which could also see him miss vital Arsenal shoot-out
thread.title_full: Liverpool’s Jordan Henderson ruled out of Leicester clash with injury which could also see him miss vital Arsenal shoot-out

author: tgannon
title: Liverpool’s Jordan Henderson ruled out of Leicester clash with injury which could also see him miss vital Arsenal shoot-out
text:
Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp insists player power was NOT to blame for Claudio Ranieri sacking ZERO TO HERO Jurgen Klopp insists Jordan Henderson is the Premier League‘s most underrated midfielder 'He got what he deserved' Former Liverpool goalkeeper Doni applauds Leicester's decision to sack Claudio Ranieri MAKING NOISE Djibril Cisse hopes former side Liverpool can win the Premier League as he gets set for his DJ career 'A strange decision' Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp compares Leicester's sacking of Claudio Ranieri to Trump and Brexit 
Henderson admitted the players were responsible for the poor results, not boss Jurgen Klopp. 
He said: “As players we take the responsibility as we feel as though we have let ourselves down, the manager down and the fans down. 
“Putting in that performance [against Spurs] doesn’t make up for it but it is a start and a step in the right direction. Now we have to build on that and keep going. Reuters Liverpool take on crisis club Leicester who have not played since the sacking of Claudio Ranieri PA:Press Association 5 Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson is also struggling to be fit for the vital Arsenal clash on the weekend 
“I wouldn’t question the attitude of the players, it is very good, but there are one or two things we need to work on which we did last week in training which could help us going forward. 
“We have fantastic quality in the team, great mentality and great character, but it is no good me saying that – it is up to us to show that from now until the end of the season.” Jordan Henderson smashes in a long distance goal to take the points at Chelsea
